hero.brandsTitle: Companies worldwide scale their information operations with IKM

aboutSection.title: Transforming Through <hl>Technological Innovation.</hl>
aboutSection.description: We are an expert service provider for the oil and gas industry. We offer a comprehensive methodology based on the synergy between people, business processes, and technology. We have a proven track record in managing, organizing, and interconnecting our clients' complex corporate information.

card1.title: Since 2002
card1.description: Founded as a consulting company focused on knowledge management for the complex and valuable information inherent to the oil and gas sector.

card2.title: A team of experts
card2.description: With more than 130 full-time professionals — including petroleum engineers, geologists, scientists, and technology experts — we bring over 20 years of experience in the oil and gas industry.

card3.title: Modern approach
card3.description: Enhancing return on investment by integrating artificial intelligence to modernize our clients’ operations and protect institutional knowledge.

cases.title: Document Management Factory
cases.description: IKM partnered with ECOPETROL to develop a solid corporate strategy for the company’s 'Complex Construction and Infrastructure' division. Through our innovative service, we created a data analysis platform for oil and gas exploration and drilling that leverages advanced tools such as artificial intelligence and machine learning to completely transform the way industrial and infrastructure projects are built and operated.

cases.title: Frontera
cases.description: Our service has significantly enhanced the company’s competitive advantage in key E&P areas as well as in its support departments. This proprietary model has been operating for more than a decade across all areas of the company, thanks to strong operations in multiple countries. IKM currently manages more than 4,000,000 documents and ensures that all corporate information is efficiently organized and easily accessible.

cases.title: Hocol
cases.description: IKM successfully implemented Hocol’s 'Corporate Memory', a powerful tool that manages more than 1.5 million documents and facilitates internal communication among all departments, including suppliers, subcontractors, consultants, and stakeholders. With over 13 years of continuous service, our team has developed strong content management strategies and methodologies, enabling new technological capabilities that have transformed operations across the company.

cases.title: Ministry of Mines and Energy
cases.description: Intelligent classification and data inventory identification of all well technical documents and seismic information from the National Petroleum Information Bank. Our service conducted a thorough and expert analysis of the integrity of Colombia’s exploratory and productive asset information.

clients.text: Trust, innovation, and results that make a difference.
clients.description: Our solutions not only optimize processes, but also generate real value for organizations that trust us. These are some of the voices that reflect how our innovations strengthen critical operations across different industries and countries.

reviews.text: 2020 was a difficult year. After almost 3 years of hybrid work between home and office, having access, precision, and control over our own information has been key. Their service gives us the confidence to know that we can find important documents and send them to regulatory agencies on time without risking interruption to our operation.

feature.title: IKM, Transforming Knowledge into Innovation
feature.description: At IKM, we drive digital transformation through intelligent technological solutions that connect data, people, and processes. We combine expertise in engineering, information management, and advanced data analytics to help organizations make strategic, secure, and evidence-based decisions. Our commitment to innovation enables us to design customized platforms that optimize information flow, enhance operational efficiency, and promote sustainability. At IKM, we turn knowledge into a tangible asset that fuels progress and strengthens our clients’ competitiveness across the most demanding industrial sectors.
